abstract: east haven police investigate bank robbery .
article: east haven -- the east haven police department is investigating a robbery at webster bank . a tall , white man in his 20s or 30s with a slim or medium build entered the bank at 260 main st. around 12:37 p. m. on wednesday and passed a note to the teller demanding cash from the drawer , police said in a release . `` the suspect was not armed , '' lt. joseph m. murgo said . `` he did not even mention a weapon . just passed the note . '' the suspect was wearing a black jacket , a yankees ball cap , fluorescent gloves , a black face mask , khaki pants and work boots , according to police .

he fled the area in a newer model white gmc 1500 single-cab pickup truck with tinted side and rear windows , police said . the pickup truck also had a strip of tint at the top of the front windshield , a rear license plate cover and a trailer hitch , according to the release . the suspect was last seen heading west on dodge avenue toward new haven . anyone with information regarding this suspect 's identity is urged to call police at 203-468-3820 .
